androidx.emoji.text

Class EmojiMetadata

  • java.lang.Object
    • androidx.emoji.text.EmojiMetadata

  • @AnyThread
public class EmojiMetadata
extends java.lang.Object
    Information about a single emoji.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  EmojiMetadata.HasGlyph
      Defines whether the system can render the emoji.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int HAS_GLYPH_ABSENT
      Device cannot render the emoji.
      static int HAS_GLYPH_EXISTS
      Device can render the emoji.
      static int HAS_GLYPH_UNKNOWN
      Not calculated on device yet.

    • Method Detail

      • draw

        public void draw(@NonNull
                 Canvas canvas,
                 float x,
                 float y,
                 @NonNull
                 Paint paint)
        Draws the emoji represented by this EmojiMetadata onto a canvas with origin at (x,y), using the specified paint.
        Parameters:
        canvas - Canvas to be drawn
        x - x-coordinate of the origin of the emoji being drawn
        y - y-coordinate of the baseline of the emoji being drawn
        paint - Paint used for the text (e.g. color, size, style)

      • getTypeface

        public Typeface getTypeface()
        Returns:
        return typeface to be used to render this metadata

      • getId

        public int getId()
        Returns:
        unique id for the emoji

      • getWidth

        public short getWidth()
        Returns:
        width of the emoji image

      • getHeight

        public short getHeight()
        Returns:
        height of the emoji image

      • getCompatAdded

        public short getCompatAdded()
        Returns:
        in which metadata version the emoji was added to metadata

      • getSdkAdded

        public short getSdkAdded()
        Returns:
        first SDK that the support for this emoji was added

      • getHasGlyph

        public int getHasGlyph()
        Returns:
        whether the emoji is in Emoji Presentation by default (without emoji style selector 0xFE0F)

      • setHasGlyph

        public void setHasGlyph(boolean hasGlyph)
        Set whether the system can render the emoji.
        Parameters:
        hasGlyph - true if system can render the emoji

      • isDefaultEmoji

        public boolean isDefaultEmoji()
        Returns:
        whether the emoji is in Emoji Presentation by default (without emoji style selector 0xFE0F)

      • getCodepointAt

        public int getCodepointAt(int index)
        Parameters:
        index - index of the codepoint
        Returns:
        the codepoint at index

      • getCodepointsLength

        public int getCodepointsLength()
